shows.title: DeadBeatz
shows.desc: Two people can’t make that much noise, right? Well…there’s the White Stripes. And Royal Blood. And now, DeadBeatz. Armed with drums, harmonica, double bass, vocals, and a beard you could lose a badger in, these two guys whip up a blues storm that will convince you there’s some extra members hiding round the back. But who needs guitars anyway, right?
